Men's Health Recommendations: 
Women's Health Recommendations: 
Overview Notes: Supplement with a good quality multivitamin which contains B vitamins in their active form such as Phytomulti from Metagenics to reduce homocysteine level to an optimal level of around 8
Comment Key: ClinicalExamComment

Overview Notes: Supplement with a good quality multivitamin which contains B vitamins in their active form such as Phytomulti from Metagenics to reduce homocysteine level to an optimal level of around 8
Comment Key: LifestyleRecommendation

Some hearing loss at high frequency
Comment Key: MentalHealthMoodRecommendation

Overview Notes: Supplement with a good quality multivitamin which contains B vitamins in their active form such as Phytomulti from Metagenics to reduce homocysteine level to an optimal level of around 8
Comment Key: MentalHealthNote
Comment Value: None
Special Investigation Notes: Nil. Sinus bradycardia on ECG but normal for patient

Overview Notes: Supplement with a good quality multivitamin which contains B vitamins in their active form such as Phytomulti from Metagenics to reduce homocysteine level to an optimal level of around 8
Comment Key: SpecialInvestigationRecommendation
Comment Value: None
Special Investigation Notes: Nil. Sinus bradycardia on ECG but normal for patient

Comment Key: VitaminsOrSupplements
Comment Value: None
Special Investigation Notes: Nil. Sinus bradycardia on ECG but normal for patient
